sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO ( BSSH_ESNTL_ID , BRTC_CODE , SIGNGU_CODE , DONG_CODE , MTLTY_NM , BSSH_CMPGN_WORDS , BSSH_PHOTO_ID , BSN_BEGIN_TIME , BSN_END_TIME , TLPHON_NO , MOBLPHON_NO , POST_NO , ADRES , DETAIL_ADRES , BULD_NM , BSN_STTUS , COPRTN_STTUS , PREFER_CO , POSTSCRIPT_CO , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , CTGRY_ID ) VALUES( #bsshEsntlId#, #brtcCode#, #signguCode#, #dongCode#, #mtltyNm#, #bsshCmpgnWords#, #bsshPhotoId#, #bsnBeginTime#, #bsnEndTime#, #tlphonNo#, #moblphonNo#, #postNo#, #adres#, #detailAdres#, #buldNm#, '01', '01', '0', '0', #frstRegisterId#, sysdate(), #ctgryId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FOXTNMBERBSSHMAPNG SET SBSCRB_STTUS = #sbscrbSttus# , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate() WHERE 1=1 AND BSSH_ESNTL_ID=#bsshEsntlId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BSSH_ESNTL_ID AS bsshEsntlId , B.MTLTY_NM AS mtltyNm FROM FOXTNMBERBSSHMAPNG AS A JOIN FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO AS B ON A.BSSH_ESNTL_ID = B.BSSH_ESNTL_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.ESNTL_ID=#esntlId# LIMIT 1
SELECT A.BSSH_ESNTL_ID AS bsshEsntlId , B.MTLTY_NM AS mtltyNm FROM FOXTNMBERBSSHMAPNG AS A JOIN FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO AS B ON A.BSSH_ESNTL_ID = B.BSSH_ESNTL_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.ESNTL_ID=#esntlId# LIMIT 1

SELECT A.CODE_ID AS brtcCode , B.CODE_NM AS brtcCodeNm , A.CODE AS signguCode , A.CODE_NM AS signguCodNm FROM ( SELECT X.* FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE X WHERE 1=1 AND X.USE_AT = 'Y' AND X.CODE_ID IN ( SELECT Y.CODE FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.USE_AT = 'Y' AND Y.CODE_ID = 'FOX003' ) ) A, ( SELECT Z.CODE , Z.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.USE_AT = 'Y' AND Z.CODE_ID = 'FOX003' ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.CODE_ID = B.CODE

SELECT BSSH_ESNTL_ID AS bsshEsntlId ,CTGRY_ID AS ctgryId ,BRTC_CODE AS brtcCode ,SIGNGU_CODE AS signguCode ,DONG_CODE AS dongCode ,DONG_CODE_NM AS dongCodeNm ,MTLTY_NM AS mtltyNm ,BSSH_CMPGN_WORDS AS bsshCmpgnWords ,BSSH_INTRCN_CN AS bsshIntrcnCn ,BSSH_PHOTO_ID AS bsshPhotoId ,BSN_BEGIN_TIME AS bsnBeginTime ,BSN_END_TIME AS bsnEndTime ,TLPHON_NO AS tlphonNo ,MOBLPHON_NO AS moblphonNo ,POST_NO AS postNo ,ADRES AS adres ,DETAIL_ADRES AS detailAdres ,BULD_NM AS buldNm ,BSN_STTUS AS bsnSttus ,COPRTN_STTUS AS coprtnSttus ,PREFER_CO AS preferCo ,POSTSCRIPT_CO AS postscriptCo ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm ,FRST_REGISTER_ID AS frstRegisterId ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS lastUpdtPnttm ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID AS lastUpduseId FROM FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO WHERE 1=1 AND BSSH_ESNTL_ID=#bsshEsntlId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO SET LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #esntlId#,
CTGRY_ID = #ctgryId#,
BRTC_CODE = #brtcCode#,
SIGNGU_CODE = #signguCode#,
DONG_CODE = #dongCode#,
MTLTY_NM = #mtltyNm#,
BSSH_CMPGN_WORDS= #bsshCmpgnWords#,
BSSH_INTRCN_CN = #bsshIntrcnCn#,
BSSH_PHOTO_ID = #bsshPhotoId#,
BSN_BEGIN_TIME = #bsnBeginTime#,
BSN_END_TIME = #bsnEndTime#,
TLPHON_NO = #tlphonNo#,
MOBLPHON_NO = #moblphonNo#,
POST_NO = #postNo#,
ADRES = #adres#,
DETAIL_ADRES = #detailAdres#,
BSN_END_TIME = #bsnEndTime#,
BULD_NM = #buldNm#,
BSN_STTUS = #bsnSttus#,
LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate() WHERE 1=1 AND BSSH_ESNTL_ID=#bsshEsntlId#

UPDATE FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO SET LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #esntlId#,
BSSH_CMPGN_WORDS= #bsshCmpgnWords#,
BSSH_INTRCN_CN = #bsshIntrcnCn#,
BSSH_PHOTO_ID = #bsshPhotoId#,
BSN_BEGIN_TIME = #bsnBeginTime#,
BSN_END_TIME = #bsnEndTime#,
LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate() WHERE 1=1 AND BSSH_ESNTL_ID=#bsshEsntlId#
UPDATE FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO SET COPRTN_STTUS = #coprtnSttus# WHERE 1=1 AND BSSH_ESNTL_ID=#bsshEsntlId#
UPDATE FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO SET POSTSCRIPT_CO = POSTSCRIPT_CO + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND BSSH_ESNTL_ID=#bsshEsntlId#
UPDATE FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO SET PREFER_CO = PREFER_CO + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND BSSH_ESNTL_ID=#bsshEsntlId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT bsshEsntlId, ctgryId, brtcCode , signguCode, dongCode,dongCodeNm, mtltyNm, bsshCmpgnWords, bsshIntrcnCn, bsshPhotoId, bsnBeginTime, bsnEndTime , tlphonNo ,moblphonNo ,postNo ,adres ,detailAdres ,buldNm ,bsnSttus ,coprtnSttus ,preferCo , postscriptCo , frstRegistPnttm ,frstRegisterId , lastUpdtPnttm ,lastUpduseId FROM( SELECT BSSH_ESNTL_ID AS bsshEsntlId ,CTGRY_ID AS ctgryId ,BRTC_CODE AS brtcCode ,SIGNGU_CODE AS signguCode ,DONG_CODE AS dongCode ,DONG_CODE_NM AS dongCodeNm ,MTLTY_NM AS mtltyNm ,BSSH_CMPGN_WORDS AS bsshCmpgnWords ,BSSH_INTRCN_CN AS bsshIntrcnCn ,BSSH_PHOTO_ID AS bsshPhotoId ,BSN_BEGIN_TIME AS bsnBeginTime ,BSN_END_TIME AS bsnEndTime ,TLPHON_NO AS tlphonNo ,MOBLPHON_NO AS moblphonNo ,POST_NO AS postNo ,ADRES AS adres ,DETAIL_ADRES AS detailAdres ,BULD_NM AS buldNm ,BSN_STTUS AS bsnSttus ,COPRTN_STTUS AS coprtnSttus ,PREFER_CO AS preferCo ,POSTSCRIPT_CO AS postscriptCo ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm ,FRST_REGISTER_ID AS frstRegisterId ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS lastUpdtPnttm ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID AS lastUpduseId FROM FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO WHERE BSN_STTUS = '1' AND BRTC_CODE ='27'
CTGRY_ID IN (#searchCtgryId#)
BRTC_CODE LIKE #searcBrtcCode#
SIGNGU_CODE LIKE #searchSignguCode#
DONG_CODE LIKE #searchDongCode#
MTLTY_NM LIKE '%' #searchMtltyNm# '%'
) A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ctgryId, brtcCode, signguCode, dongCode LIMIT 10
SELECT ESNTL_ID bsshEsntlId FROM FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO WHERE 1=1 AND BSN_STTUS != '99'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FOXTNBSSHBASSINFO SET BSN_STTUS = '99' WHERE 1=1 AND BSSH_ESNTL_ID=#bsshEsntlId#
